conversations.value:
Can you describe the main features of this image for me?
<image>

The image shows a narrow street with two buses driving past some shops. One bus is a regular bus, and the other is a red double-decker bus. They are traveling in the same direction, with the red double-decker bus positioned behind the regular bus. 

There are also several cars on the street, two of which are situated ahead of the regular bus, and another behind the double-decker bus. A few pedestrians can be seen walking along the street, some close to the buses, and others close to the shops. The scene captures the bustling ambiance of a busy urban street.
